name: It's Raining Cats and Dogs - v2
name_original: It's Raining Cats and Dogs - v2
description:
A mini-game for the Chabot Library and Chabot Game Lab - "It's Raining Cats and Dogs."

v2 updates (9.20.22):

  • Animated the duck, added Heelys, platforms, and level system
  • To-do: Story of why it's raining cats and dogs, boss level, different game modes (i.e. carrying the cats and dogs to a platform), special items (cones, etc.)
